synopsis.text:
Kyoto University's medical school is the ultimate dream for high school student Uryu Kamihate, who has faced a challenging upbringing as an orphan. Just as he thought his life couldn't take any more unexpected turns, the Amagami family opens their doors and hearts to him. However, this newfound home comes with a twist: he must marry one of the three captivating Amagami sisters – Asahi, Yae, or Yuna – to preserve the family's temple legacy.

Balancing his medical aspirations and the Amagami family's marriage condition, Uryu finds himself in a whirlwind of romantic comedy and dramatic situations. As he navigates the complexities of living under the same roof as the charming shrine maidens, Uryu's resilience and determination are put to the test. Will he succumb to the pressures of marriage or rise above to achieve his dream? Join Uryu in this heartwarming and hilarious journey as he embarks on the greatest crossroads of his life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
